entry.title: The Architecture and Idea
entry.content:
The MVP Design

The MVP should contain basic feature of the full project.

The Execution

Server Model

  • Implementation of the Communication Tunnel
  • Able to recive the clients sended request and send cmd to client
  • Need to implement the MQTT
  • Web View/Interface , In the view , should able to monitor all of the clients
  • Send cmd from webview
  • Maintain and Create the SSH
  • File Server
  • Get Client Jobs and all
  • PGP Connect etc.

Client Model

  • Connect with a particular server
  • Recive cmd from the server
  • Send device info and others in the tunnel
  • Device Admin
  • Shell access
  • Remote Management
  • Contnious Health Check etc.

TechStack

  • The Node Server

More Features are added in trello, To be added in Server /Client please fill the form : Google Form Link

entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
Welcome to Patch Management. This is our first Post.From today,we'll start working on the project from today - 20th Nov, 2021.

Simply add Markdown files (or folders) to the blog directory.

Regular blog authors can be added to authors.yml.

The blog post date can be extracted from filenames, such as:

  • 2019-05-30-welcome.md
  • 2019-05-30-welcome/index.md

Thank You Everyone.
